snippet: The Kenyan military said Friday that it had killed an estimated 100 Somali militants when helicopter gunships attacked a gathering of more than 200 rebel fighters near Badhade.
abstract: Kenyan military says that it has killed an estimated 100 Somali militants in an attack on a gathering of more than 200 Shabab rebel fighters.
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan military said Friday that it had killed an estimated 100 Somali militants when helicopter gunships attacked a gathering of more than 200 rebel fighters near Badhade.

headline.main: Kenya Says It Killed 100 Somali Rebels
headline.print_headline: Kenya Says It Killed 100 Somali Rebels
